meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>feeling</kanji> where you <kanji>sigh</kanji> is one in which you're surprised by something, and can't believe it, so you sigh. Ugh, *sigh*. What <kanji>token</kanji> represents this in writing? An <vocabulary>exclamation mark</vocabulary>!!!!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
